article_title: Medicare Bundled Payment Gains Momentum With Hospitals, Nursing Homes

article_metadata.description: Even when medical care providers aren’t forced to accept bundled payments from Medicare that could cost them money if the care isn’t better and costs aren't in check, they are willing to embrace such new reimbursement. New data from research firm Avalere Health indicates about 9% of U.S. acute care hospitals [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
